## MAZE TOKEN
### MAZE - decentralized, mineable, proof-of-work SLP token based on [Mistcoin](https://mistcoin.org/)

MAZE and Mist are based on _"Bitcoin script, allowing tokens to be mined using proof-of-work to help decentralize allocation of newly minted tokens*"_ with a permisionless reward process

MAZE Token id: bb553ac2ac7af0fcd4f24f9dfacc7f925bfb1446c6e18c7966db95a8d50fb378

MAZE Token contract environment:
- MINER_COVENANT_V1=""
- TOKEN_INIT_REWARD_V1=800000000
- TOKEN_HALVING_INTERVAL_V1=4320
- MINER_DIFFICULTY_V1=3
- TOKEN_START_BLOCK_V1=645065
- TOKEN_ID_V1="bb553ac2ac7af0fcd4f24f9dfacc7f925bfb1446c6e18c7966db95a8d50fb378"

### [Here](https://github.com/mazetoken/miners) is a tutorial how to install the miner on Windows or Android phone

### MAZE Reward Schedule:

Token Height | MAZE Reward

1-4320 | 800

4320-8640 | 400

8640-12960 | 266,66

12960-17280 | 200

17280-21600 | 160

21600-25920 | 133,33

25920-30240 | 114,29

30240-34560 | 100

34560< | ...

MAZE covenant contract before removing dummy variables and nips not optimized -


MAZE covenant contract before removing dummy variables and nips optimized -


MAZE was created as an experiment. If you can't "catch" Mist you can try with Maze. Have fun
